Html.content: Per default there are just the locales en and de set up. This impacts f.i. the options available in the language drop-down menu of the form-based conent editor. To support more languages one has to add the respective entries to the openCms configuration file based on the two-letter lowercase code as identified by the ISO 639-1 list. The configuration file is located in the web application folder, usually at: opencms/WEB-INF/config/opencms-system.xml .
